response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? haben wir als verbraucher keine rechte mehr? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation:

"why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? don't we have any rights as consumers? #dataprivacy #privacy"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and sell personal data without proper consent or regard for consumers' privacy rights. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics.
